评论详情: It was ok. It was too wide and a little too cropped  for my liking. The fabric looks cheap compared to the pictures advertised.
I teach tai chi and this sweatshirt has been my go “uniform” top. The crop fit is perfect and it has held up to weekly washes beautifully.  I’m definitely getting more in different colors.

评论概述: Not thin but not too thick
评论详情: Good weight to the fabric. Washed several times and hasn’t faded or lost shape.

评论概述: Perfect length for high waisted pants
评论详情: Got two for Xmas and immediately ordered two more. Perfect length for my high waisted jeans. Not too long and not too short. These are my new winter uniform!
Cute decent quality for Amazon.  It’s thick seems well-made. The dye is starting to fade after a handful of washes.  I’ve worn the sweatshirt a lot. I definitely like it, very cute.

This "dark gray" does NOT match the brands cargo sweats in the same color! After that, I will say it's a nice quality BUT...I got an XL to buy myself a smidge of extra length...DON'T. This shirt is CROPPED ladies and I mean cropped! I'm 5'8" and 140 and this XL doesn't even meet the waistband of my high waisted sweatpants. Not too happy about that but if you like 'em cropped...again I WILL give it props for quality but good luck finding pants that match!
Wished the shoulders had a better dropped shoulder look. The sleeves were also a tad bit short. I normally wear a small in top, and purchased a medium and the sleeves were still too short.

My Mom is 93 and VERY picky.  She wanted a V-neck sweatshirt which isn't that easy to find, plus it has to be soft and comfortable, and she's short so the cropped aspect was good for her despite her age.  I expected to here that she wanted to return it when I sent it to her, but she said "I'm wearing it now".  I was amazed.  :)
This sweatshirt looks nice but there is  no stretch to it at all. I purchased this to wear during my warm ups for working out but the restrictiveness has me sending this one back

评论概述: Strangely wide sleeves with stiff fabric
评论详情: Heavier weight, but stiffer material. Sleeves are wider throughout, especially in the armpit area, and looks sloppy and ill-fitting.
Way too warm for me in Florida I was looking for a casual one to wear around the house on those few cooler days but this was too heavy for my liking

The material is thick and doesn’t look cheap. Falls right at the hip. I usually wear size small but opted to get a medium based on reviews. I think small would fit ok too, I might get a different color in small to compare. I’m 5’1 & 135 pounds for reference. I only gave it 4 stars because the color is different than the one shown in the picture. I purchased coffee gray , but it is lighter more khaki . Still a nice color so I’ll keep it
Cute sleeves and v neck elevate a grey sweatshirt
Thick, soft and warm , has good sizing and stretch . Short enough to be cropped but works for longer torsos . Color matched picture .
Cute

评论概述: Meh - maybe for someone else but not for me
评论详情: I recently purchased this v-neck cropped grey sweatshirt, and unfortunately, it didn’t meet my expectations. The material felt a bit cheap, which was disappointing, and the cut just wasn’t flattering on me. I ended up donating it right away, as I didn’t think I would wear it. While it might work for others, it wasn’t the right fit for me.

This was very soft and seemed high quality. I love the v-neck style which can be hard to find in a quality sweatshirt. However the sizing and fit was awkward. I ordered an XL since it was cropped. I'm normally an L or XL in tops due to my chest size (38/40F) and while this fit my chest, the sleeves were huge - wide and long - and there was extra material under the arms so it just didn't look good at all. I don't think a smaller size would help so this is going back.

评论概述: Don’t buy if you have big boobs
评论详情: Comfy cute by not oversized looking at all very short and I have large boobs

评论概述: very stiff fabric and runs small
评论详情: The color was not quite the same as the photo and the fabric was stiff

Is really soft, and the material is thicker than I expected which is really lovely! I love the fit on the crop, it hits at a great spot. The only problem is the amount of pilling, but it is a fleece so it’s pretty normal.
Really comfortable sweatshirt. Perfect thickness too. The color is a nice tan which goes with a lot of things. I like the style of the v neck too. Good quality too
I was originally thinking I wouldn’t be able to wear to work. But when I tried it on the shoulders are kinda puffed, so I pulled it off in the office. Starting a new trend
Fits well and good material. Very nice basic item!

This is thick, soft, and fits perfectly. I am 5'2 and 140 lbs and the crop is flattering, it hits right at my waistline, and no skin showing. This is one of the nicest sweatshirts I have ever had. Love it and will buy more colors.
The quality is great. With that the sweatshirt is very very thick. The fit runs big. It is soft and comfortable but sometimes appears stiff because the fabric is so thick. The green is a nice color.

I thought this was going to be more of an oversized sweatshirt, but it is more fitted than I expected when ordering my true size. That being said, I still love this sweatshirt. It is comfortable, fits great and the sleeves are long enough. I wear it often and always get compliments. I will order more in the future in other colors!

评论概述: Automet is my go to for pull overs
评论详情: This cropped pull over is so comfy and the quality for the price is amazing and thick it’s very warm as well. I got a size x-large for a more oversized look I'm usually a size medium but I wanted that oversized fit so if you want a oversized fit go up but if you don’t I say stick to your size.
Soft thick sweatshirt. For me it fits true to size. I ordered the green/olive and the color matches the pictures.
The shoulders and arms are huge, seriously looks like I'm wearing football pads underneath the sweatshirt.
This sweatshirt is perfect. Fits great and is the perfect cropped length! Medium weight. Want in other colors!

I wasn't a fan of this sweatshirt. The fit on it was really awkward and unflattering. It looked boxy, but not in a trendy way. While it does seem well made and is a nice weight, it's definitely not my favorite.

评论概述: Perfect fit for a Short Gal!
评论详情: Loved everything - crop fit perfect for me, thickness, warm for winter, colors, pretty. What isn't there to love about this sweatshirt?
I love mine! I am 4'11, it falls right between my hip and waistline so you can't see skin unless you reach up. I love these kind of crop sweaters.
It’s a good weight and nice basic sweatshirt to add to my wardrobe.  Quality seems good and washes up well.

This has become one of my favorite sweatshirts! I like that it's a heavy weight cotton/poly fleece fabric, but feels more like cotton against my skin. It's a cropped style, but it's more like a high/low design (a little longer in the back). The ribbing on the hem makes it fit better than some crops I have (the kind that stick out in the back) The front isn't too short (no skin shows) & it comes down to the top of my pants. Also, I like the "V" neckline. It feels a little more stylish to me. It runs TTS. For reference, I normally wear a size small, but I wanted an oversized fit so I got the medium & it's perfect. I like this sweatshirt so much that I'm buying another one! I would recommend it! : )
This sweatshirt is perfect for running around & a perfect cropped length. I'm 5'5 & about 128 pounds & got the medium.

This sweatshirt is so boxy and cropped at a weird length! It’s either too short or too long, a strange in the middle. It is very unflattering. The green color is lovely and the fabric is soft but I really can’t imagine any body type on which the cut would look good. I returned it immediately.
Fits bigger than a crop but looks great

I got light green and the color was mostly accurate to what the images show. It may be more on the sage green side in my opinion. The sweatshirt itself is soft and comfy. My only complaint is that the sleeves are a bit too short for my comfort. Normally a medium gives me the perfect sleeve length, but the length of these sleeves make it just slightly uncomfortable enough not to run for it in my closet.
This sweater was a gift. It was true to size, liked the color and texture of the sweater. Very happy with this purchase!
Not the color in the picture, a lot more of a brighter beige or tan color. Sizing and fit is a bit off too.
Honestly a very weird cut along the bottom and just fit overall. Maybe if you’re a fairly thin person it would be more flattering but as someone more midsize, I don’t think I’d recommend

I got this for my niece along with a couple of other cropped sweatshirts. She said this one is ok, but is her least favorite of the bunch. She said the fit is weird and the sleeves are off. Not super happy with this shirt.
Just fits great!! I WOULD buy this crop sweatshirt again :)

i would give this five stars for the overall fit, style, and price and everything however it sheds a LOT. i wasnt expecting that but little balls of fuzz ended up all over my undershirt, bra, and was even falling out from the sweater. after a wash, its fine now but still i wish i had known how much it shed before wearing.

Size as expected. Size up if in question, you want it roomy.  Sleeves maybe a hair short, that is the style. I am tall though. So very cute and comfortable with high waisted leggings at home.  Good quality, but I would handwash for longevity. Lukewarm water. Air dry. Comes an inch below the belly button. Please note this is not work clothing. I liked well enough to get more colors.
This crewneck is super comfortable and fit great! The color was as expected / shown in the photos.

I bought this for myself, I love cuddling up with a nice sweatshirt. The material is awesome, soft on the inside and well made on the outside. I got a size larger than I normally take just incase it shrinks but even if it does it won't be a problem. I love it!
So comfy and cute at the same time! The fit was perfect, it wasn’t great with high waisted jeans!

评论概述: Soft and warm, but size up
评论详情: First off, the coffee grey is much more of a tan color which was a disappointment because I was looking for a brown tone like the listing image showed. Secondly, this is a warm sweatshirt. It is extremely thick and the inner fleece is very soft! However, because of this the fabric when worn is pretty stiff even after washing a few times. It fits well, but was a tad shorter than I prefer in my sweatshirts. It lifts up and can show my stomach when I raise my arms. For reference, I am 5'5" and 200 lbs and am usually in between L and XL sizing in women's clothing. I went with L with this sweatshirt and probably would have been happier with an XL for the additional length and bust. So if you are in between sizes and looking for a looser/comfier feel, I suggest sizing up. Overall, it's well made and a warm fabric so not too bad in my opinion.
Can’t go wrong wit a black crop sweater
Great quality good price

评论概述: It's fine, not great. Returned it though..
评论详情: Runs small, is thin, NOT a v-neck when you put it on. Looks like a regular sweatshirt. Has much much kich higher hopes with this. Won't be spending money on another one that's for sure.  ***UPDATE*** ended up returning. It's just not a good sweatshirt. Arms are way too short and Everytime I moved my arms up, the sweatshirt nearly exposed my breasts and it's not even a cropped sweatshirt. VERY poorly made and not at all worth the price.
Good quality especially in these colder months
Super nice for the fall and winter. The material is thicker than I though so it is sure to keep you warm!

评论概述: Soft and thick, warm but not bulky
评论详情: The sweatshirt got much softer after an initial washing.  It's a nice thick material that keeps you warm, without looking to bulky.  The only complain is that the sleeves are a tad short for what my daughter likes, and when she puts her arm up, the sleeve rides up quite a bit.  Some people may not mind that, but it was enough that my daughter mentioned it.  The color seemed to match the picture, which was nice.  Very happy with the sweatshirt.
The material of this garment is very comfortable and soft. However, for me (I typically wear size S and purchased an S), the neckline is a bit too wide, and the sleeves are slightly too long.
I like this sweater fits nice and cozy. I’m wearing now casually for going to work.  I love the fact that it keeps me warm.
Collar doesn’t lay flat, silhouette makes you look like a football player, looks cheap. I’ve found way cuter sweatshirts for the same price on Amazon. Skip this one.
The sweater is such a perfect crew neck. It's not too long and not too short/cropped. I am excited to take it to the gym but it's also a really good basic sweater. Really good quality and soft.

评论概述: so much lint from the fleece lining!!!
评论详情: I like to browse for cute fashion forward items I can look presentable in while at home and this one seems to fit the bill. While it said cropped on the page, other reviewers who said it was like medium crop (not as severe), sold me. I want to cover my stomach when its cold out - we are not trying to get sick! Even though the interior is a bit "fleece" like, nothing rubbed off onto the shirt I had underneath - always a concern for me when I see such linings. Even though the instructions said to hand wash, I put it in the washing machine on COLD and heavy with my other things. The lining of the inside got all over my entire load. I had so much to lint roll off. It was never ending when I was trying to shake it out of my load and the sweatshirt itself. I do not reccomend. No one is going to hand wash a sweatshirt. This is a poor quality lining that didnt reveal itself until after the wash.

Even though this is advertised as a hoodie it's a sweatshirt. Nonetheless it's cute. It is cropped so be  aware of that. I like the color as well. I sized up and glad that I did because this is not an oversized fit, it is TTS. It's very soft feels comfortable on the skin. Worth the price and a good value.

I was expecting a really thin, not sized right, cheap feeling sweatshirt. Boy was I wrong and I am so happy about that.  It’s crop but not so crop that you see skin. To me it’s the perfect crop length. The other surprise is the material.  It definitely does not feel cheap at all. It’s a thick soft sweatshirt. I love the V neck it has too. It’s so comfortable that I am thinking of going and getting more colors.

It's been awhile sense I've gotten a sweater this good. It's so comfy and it is warm but not too warm. I love the fit...I think it says cropped, but it's not too short at all. I love the gray color that I got, it looks good with anything. However, I now want one in every color. This sweater is truly the best!

Obsessed!  This sweat shirt is so freakin cute!  I am wearing it to work today and it is perfect for this cold fall morning!  The color is true to what is looks like online, the inside is soft and the fit is slightly oversized.  It is also pretty thick and I was surprised by how warm it is!  It has a slight high low hem line as well which I personally love. I am 5'2" 105lbs and I am wearing a small.  Perfect for a casual office environment or for just hanging out!  Super versatile!
True to size, and very nice color. Material is nice and soft. Would recommend.
Super cute and definitely a good staple piece. However, definitely not a v-beck and im very disappointed.

My teenage daughter loves this sweatshirt! I got her the Large and it fits just how she likes it, oversized and baggy. The V-neck is very comfortable and keeps this from strangling your neck. It's not too cropped to show your tummy while you're just standing. The green color is very nice, and the sweatshirt is soft and thick to keep you warm. I needed it to justify the price, because this is expensive to me, and I think it does. It does not feel thin and cheap. This comes in lots of cute fall colors, and I'd be happy with any of them!

This is such a comfy sweatshirt! It's starting to really cool off in Colorado and I'm so glad for a good comfortable go-to like this sweatshirt. It's perfect for running errands, taking the dogs on a stroll, or a good workout. It's not a clingy fabric and it seems pretty well structured. The color is lovely - I've been gravitating to a lot of greens recently and this is the most delicate sage green.
I ordered my usual medium and it feels more like a large. The material feels quality and the inside is so soft. Can't wait for the weather to get cooler so I can wear it out.

Overall I’m a fan of this sweatshirt. It’s very soft and warm. It’s pretty thick and super comfortable. Perfect for all and winter. I love the fit. I’d consider it to be a mid crop. Not too short. I only took a star off because the trim doesn’t lay completely flat after I washed and dried it the first time. Otherwise it’s perfect for a casual day!

评论概述: Looks great, warm, don't put your hands up
评论详情: This sweater looks great and is very warm. You can't lift your arms up above your head while wearing it because the entire thing comes up, but that's not really an issue for me because when would I do that? It is a bit warmer than I expected, which I actually like. I feel that I could go out in pretty cold air in this without a coat and be comfortable.

评论概述: Nice sweatshirt, color just not accurate
评论详情: -Sweatshirt fits well -seems to be good quality -color not accurate
This sweater is very soft on the inside but it’s a little smaller than I expected. It’s also very comfortable.
